overview: What would be my Dream Lover? Well... Let me tell you about an absolutely gorgeous guy—about a guy who would know just what to say and do to make me feel good—a tall, dark, handsome man with a dreamy glow. A fantasy maybe, but he's real to me. He knows how to touch me in just the right places. He knows how to handle all of my man's needs. He'll always stand by me. And he will live up to my expectations of a Dream Lover.
title: Dream Lover
